metadata.title: 5 Boring Ways to Become More Creative
metadata.author: Mark Manson
metadata.description: Creative people are anything but boring, but the creative process itself involves a lot of mundane work and boring consistency.

headings.text: What Does It Mean to be “Creative” Anyway?
Get Your Shit Together — Here’s How
1. Focus on Doing the Work, Not Flashes of Inspiration
4. Find the Most Creative People in Your Field and Steal From Them
5. Treat Ideas Like Investments: Buy Low, Sell High
